alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 3:31AM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to around 5 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Cimarron and Texas Counties. In Texas, Dallam County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
